mapper.select: SELECT m.goods_id goodsId, m.price price, m.goods_name goodsName, m.explain_book explainBook, m.is_otc isOtc, m.logo logo, m.approval_number approvalNumber, m.manufacturer manufacturer, m.zhuzhi zhuzhi, m.c2 c2 FROM tb_medicine m where m.is_del = 0
SELECT * FROM tb_medicine m where m.goods_id = #{id} and m.is_del = 0
SELECT d.id id, d.disease_name diseaseName, d.disease_introduce diseaseIntroduce, d.disease_url diseaseUrl, d.disease_part diseasePart, d.cure_depart cureDepart FROM tb_disease d where d.is_del = 0
SELECT * FROM tb_disease d where d.id = #{id} and d.is_del = 0
SELECT d.num FROM tb_data d where d.type = #{type} order by d.create_time desc LIMIT 0,1
